##Question 9

__a__
```{r q9 a}
pairs(Auto)
```

__b__
```{r q9 b}
cor(subset(Auto,select=-name))
```

__c__
```{r q9 c}
lm.fit9=lm(mpg~.-name,Auto)
summary(lm.fit9)
```

__d__
```{r q9 d}
plot(lm.fit9)
```

__e__
Fit predictors with interaction effects
```{r q9 e}
lm.fit9=lm(mpg~horsepower*weight,Auto)
summary(lm.fit9)
```

__f__
```{r q9 f}
lm.fit9=lm(mpg~log(horsepower),Auto)
summary(lm.fit9)
```
